body:
I am trying `config.yaml` with `install_tree` and `module_roots` (set to non-spack directory). When I do now `spack load` then I get : 
```bash
 spack load mypkg
ModuleCmd_Load.c(213):ERROR:105: Unable to locate a modulefile for 'mypkg-github-gcc-4.9.3-o5jdini'
```
@tgamblin : Two question : 
* Am I supposed set proper `MODULEPATH`? If so, we can close this ticket (but documentation doesn't say this).
* Shouldn't spack use it from what I have specified in `config.yaml`?
title: spack `config.yaml` and module path error
